info.description: This is an API documentation for Agentcis. For this, you must use API token generated in the settings. Every request begins with https://{yoursubdomain}.agentcisapp.com
info.title: Agentcis APIs

get.summary: Fetch the agents list based on assignee

put.summary: Save application's sub agent or superagent
put.description: Save application's sub agent or superagent

delete.summary: Delete application's sub agent or superagent
delete.description: Delete application's sub agent or superagent

get.summary: Fetch the partners list with branch

get.description: Returns a custom fields of contacts

post.description: Create a prospect or a client
Move the application to next stage
Move the application to previous stage
Change application status to either Completed or Discontinued

post.summary: Add an assignee to the application
post.description: Add an assignee to the application

delete.summary: Delete an assignee from the application
delete.description: Delete an assignee from the application
